select i.id as itemId, i.item_name as itemName, i.sell_counts as sellCounts, ii.url as imgUrl, tempSpec.price as price from items as i left join items_img as ii on i.id = ii.item_id left join (select its.item_id as itemId, min(its.price_discount) as price from items_spec as its group by item_id) as tempSpec on tempSpec.itemId = i.id where ii.is_main = 1
and i.item_name like '%${paramMap.keywords}%'
order by
i.sell_counts desc
tempSpec.price asc
i.item_name asc
